questions.title: list of askbot sites
questions.summary:
Is there a list of public askbot sites?

  • answers.ros.org - Robotics Operating System Answers site
  • ask.fedoraproject.org - Fedora Linux
  • answers.dotcloud.com - dotCloud - commercial web-application hosting platform
  • asterisk-support.ru - Russian Asterisk user & developer community.
  • ask.sagemath.org - Sage is a Mathematics engine written in Python.
  • investmentqa.com - forum affiliated with moneyterms.co.uk
  • SHAZAM econometrics software user community
  • answers.gameduino.com
  • macfaq.ru
  • ask.libreoffice.org
  • questions.astrobin.com - astrophotography and astronomy.

Less active:

  • http://www.dieselpushertalk.com
  • http://ask.gi-link.com
  • http://ask.xbase.ac.uk
  • http://help.freeavailabledomains.com/
  • http://how2occupy.com/
  • http://fifooverflow.com/

This list is incomplete. Please add to the list once your site is up.

Thanks.
